name: Mt. Persimmon
description:
This 2D platforming game takes place in the titular mountain, Mt. Persimmon, where a young water mage resides with an abundance of fruits and plants. One day, the peace is disturbed when his mentor, the guardian of Mt. Persimmon, falls ill, and a robot army invades to plunder its resources.

You must guide the young mage and use his water powers to vanguish the robotic army, grow fruits, and provide platforming aid to find the Sacred Persimmon.
